name: The 2025 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Perception and Computer Vision
content: The 2025 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Perception and Computer Vision (CIPCV 2025) will be held in Hangzhou, China during May 16-18, 2025, which is technically sponsored by Society of Advanced Science and Engineering (SASE), Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University and Shanghai Jiao Tong University. The conference has the objective of creating an international forum for academics, researchers and scientists from worldwide to discuss worldwide results and proposals regarding to the soundest issues related to artificial intelligence, computer vision and intelligent perception.
